properties.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 12 at 6:02AM CST until February 12 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck ND
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills
as low as 50 below zero expected. For the Wind Chill Advisory,
very cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero expected.

* WHERE...Rolette county.

* WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST today. For
the Wind Chill Advisory, from noon today to noon CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause
frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you
wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO NOON CST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
